p: Serum and CSF samples from suspected JE cases in the acute phase were collected at the hospital [ 11, 13]. Mosquito samples were collected by UV traps (Kungfu Dude Mosquito & Fly Trap, LTS-M02; Wuhan Ji Xing Medical Technology Co, Wuhan, China) from breeding environments that included public land in villages and pigpens with the permission of owners/residents from 7:00 pm to 6:00 am the next morning. The mosquitoes were kept at −20°C for 1 h for anesthetization and then morphologically classified on ice. Both human and mosquito specimens were transported to the laboratory on dry ice [ 13, 14].
